guide.introduction: In this tutorial, we'll make a simple felt character for our stories.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this tutorial, we'll make a simple felt character for our stories.

Relevant parts
  • Templates
  • Felt in varying colors
  • Tracing pen
  • Googly eyes
  • Fine point Sharpie or Fabric Marker
  • Tacky Glue or Felt Glue
  • Embellishments- Yarn, string, glitter, etc.

parts.text: Fine point Sharpie or Fabric Marker

lines.text: First choose a story that you would like to recreate in felt (refer to word doc).  Figure out the characters, accessories, objects, animals, scenery, etc. that you'll need to make.  I used the children's Bible to get good ideas.  You can use the attached template to help create the characters.  If you need other images, search Google Images under coloring sheets for basic outlines. (ex. "camel coloring page").

lines.text: -felt in various colors (tan, brown, black, brighter colors for clothing)

lines.text: -templates- printed from attached sheet or your own
lines.text_raw: -templates- printed from attached sheet or your own

lines.text: -tacky glue or felt glue (regular elmer's glue tends to soak into felt and also makes the felt hard and stiff)
lines.text_raw: -tacky glue or felt glue (regular elmer's glue tends to soak into felt and also makes the felt hard and stiff)

lines.text: -fabric marker or ultra fine point Sharpie for mouths, noses, decorations on clothing, shoes, etc.
lines.text_raw: -fabric marker or ultra fine point Sharpie for mouths, noses, decorations on clothing, shoes, etc.

lines.text: -embellishments- doll hair, string, yarn, glitter, fabric remnants, puffy paints
lines.text_raw: -embellishments- doll hair, string, yarn, glitter, fabric remnants, puffy paints

lines.text: Print out template on cardstock for easier tracing.
lines.text_raw: Print out template on cardstock for easier tracing.

lines.text: Dress and style the character by picking out clothing, accessories and hairstyle.  Cut these templates out too.
lines.text_raw: Dress and style the character by picking out clothing, accessories and hairstyle.  Cut these templates out too.

lines.text: Trace your templates onto the appropriate colored felt and cut them out.
lines.text_raw: Trace your templates onto the appropriate colored felt and cut them out.

lines.text: Carefully (without overdoing it on the glue) glue the hair, clothes and accessories to your character.
lines.text_raw: Carefully (without overdoing it on the glue) glue the hair, clothes and accessories to your character.

lines.text: Give him sight!  Glue the eyes on your little man.
lines.text_raw: Give him sight!  Glue the eyes on your little man.

lines.text: Using fabric markers or puffy paints, add details like sandal straps, noses, mouths and decorative details to clothing.
lines.text_raw: Using fabric markers or puffy paints, add details like sandal straps, noses, mouths and decorative details to clothing.

lines.text: You can also add other embellishments to create these cute little characters...string for ties and belts, yarn hair, glitter for the gold/silver coins or angel wings, jewels or sequins on crowns.Be creative and have fun!!
